transArray.content: good environment. The breakfast is delicious, hygienic and clean, and the transportation is convenient

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. The hotel is located near the West Fourth Ring Auxiliary Road and is at Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, with convenient transportation. It's great to see your positive recognition of our hygiene in your review. Before guests check in, we will conduct ward rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets to ensure that all guest supplies are changed "one for each guest". Please feel free to check in. Breakfast is from 7:00 to 10:00, which is a long meal time. We will Keep up the good work and continue to do a good job in all aspects. I believe you will have a better stay experience next time you check in. All the hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life! General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
